0

0
% x  y  r (in m)
% Number of walls
4
% xa  ya  xb  yb (in m)

% box_env[1].inf (in m)
0
% box_env[1].sup (in m)
30
% box_env[2].inf (in m)
0
% box_env[2].sup (in m)
20
